titles.title: Feature-engine: A Python package for feature engineering for machine learning

citation.unstructured_citation: Scikit-learn: Machine Learning in Python, Pedregosa, F. and Varoquaux, G. and Gramfort, A. and Michel, V. and Thirion, B. and Grisel, O. and Blondel, M. and Prettenhofer, P. and Weiss, R. and Dubourg, V. and Vanderplas, J. and Passos, A. and Cournapeau, D. and Brucher, M. and Perrot, M. and Duchesnay, E., Journal of Machine Learning Research, 12, 2825–2830, 2011

Winning the KDD Cup Orange Challenge with Ensemble Selection, Niculescu-Mizil, Alexandru and Perlich, Claudia and Swirszcz, Grzegorz and Sindhwani, Vikas and Liu, Yan and Melville, Prem and Wang, Dong and Xiao, Jing and Hu, Jianying and Singh, Moninder and Shang, Wei Xiong and Zhu, Yan Feng, Proceedings of KDD-Cup 2009 Competition, 23–34, 2009, Dror, Gideon and Boullé, Mar and Guyon, Isabelle and Lemaire, Vincent and Vogel, David, 7, Proceedings of Machine Learning Research, New York, New York, USA, 28 Jun, PMLR, http://proceedings.mlr.press/v7/niculescu09/niculescu09.pdf, http://proceedings.mlr.press/v7/niculescu09.html, We describe our wining solution for the KDD Cup Orange Challenge.
Kotsiantis, Sotiris and Kanellopoulos, Dimitris and Pintelas, P., 2006, jan, 111-117, Data Preprocessing for Supervised Learning, 1, International Journal of Computer Science, 1
Dong, Ying, Beating Kaggle the easy way, 2015, Technische Universität Darmstadt, Studienarbeit, https://www.ke.tu-darmstadt.de/lehre/arbeiten/studien/2015/Dong_Ying.pdf

The 2009 Knowledge Discovery and Data Mining Competition (KDD Cup 2009): Challenges in Machine Learning, Dror, G. and Boullé, M. and Guyon, I., 2011, Microtome Publishing , http://www.mtome.com/Publications/CiML/CiML-v3-book.pdf

Predicting customer behaviour: The University of Melbourne’s KDD Cup report, Miller, Hugh and Clarke, Sandy and Lane, Stephen and Lonie, Andrew and Lazaridis, David and Petrovski, Slave and Jones, Owen, Proceedings of KDD-Cup 2009 Competition, 45–55, 2009, Dror, Gideon and Boullé, Mar and Guyon, Isabelle and Lemaire, Vincent and Vogel, David, 7, Proceedings of Machine Learning Research, New York, New York, USA, 28 Jun, PMLR, http://proceedings.mlr.press/v7/miller09/miller09.pdf, http://proceedings.mlr.press/v7/miller09.html, We discuss the challenges of the 2009 KDD Cup along with our ideas and methodologies for modelling the problem. The main stages included aggressive nonparametric feature selection, careful treatment of categorical variables and tuning a gradient boosting machine under Bernoulli loss with trees.
